jobDescription: Led a team of developers in creating dynamic user interfaces for e-commerce platforms, enhancing user engagement by 30%. Utilized AngularJS and Bootstrap for responsive design.
Developed and maintained both client-side and server-side applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Implemented RESTful APIs, improving data retrieval times by 40%.
Spearheaded the redesign of the company's main website, resulting in a 50% increase in traffic. Integrated third-party APIs and optimized website performance.
Collaborated with developers to design intuitive user interfaces for mobile applications, leading to a 25% increase in user retention rates.
Provide consulting services to startups on web development best practices, including performance optimization and scalability solutions.
Developed interactive features for websites using JavaScript and jQuery, enhancing user experience and engagement.
Built and maintained server-side applications using PHP and MySQL, ensuring robust data management and security.
Oversee web development projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
Implemented continuous integration and deployment pipelines, reducing deployment times by 60%.
Designed and deployed scalable cloud infrastructure solutions using AWS, improving system reliability.
